nodes.description: You need to present a united front when it is impossible to leave.

thumbnail.alternativeText: How to Pretend Your Marriage Is Fine

nodes.title: Pretending that your marriage is fine is how to do it

data.body:
## The loneliness of a couple that is far away

 Visitors can see a professionally staged photo of your family in the hall. Your heart breaks when you look at it. The truth is that your [marriage](https://jovivaspo.github.io/healthyrel-blog/there-are-divorce-registries-that-help-people-who-lose-their-stuff-to-their-ex) is not real at all. You put up a facade to make it look like you are doing well. You are in pain, threatened, and counting the hours until you are able to escape.

 My first marriage ended this way. Growing up within the confines of a relationship is what marrying young means. We were separated as we grew over the next decade. When we realized how far apart we were, it was sad but not ugly. We tried to make it work for a couple of years, but didn't. We didn't know how to close the gap or reconcile.

 We had a young child and my husband's mother was sick, so it would have been better if we had split up. We kept going. Pretending.

 I know when I knew we were done, it was during my baby's birth. He was asked to drive me to my friend's home after I had a threatened miscarriage. AxiosError: Request failed with status code 500 The hill was steep.

 I wanted to know if you would drive me up. I don't want to risk it.

It doesn't matter if you lose this one, you can always have another.

 It sounded worse than it did. He couldn't connect the small life I had with a human being. I knew I couldn't be with someone who wasn't thinking.

By the way, he turned out to be a great dad.

 When there was no need, we did not go anywhere together. He was working, walking the dog, and watching TV when we withdrew into our own small worlds. We made love occasionally, but there wasn't much passion. To fulfill a purpose was all it was.

## Why did we say we lived a lie?

 Fear is what the answer is. Our life is in danger of being dismantled. Our child is scared of being disrupted and hurt. Our families are worried about upsetting us. There is fear of the unknown beyond the walls. We had worked for many years and were afraid of losing everything.

 Surprisingly, we were good friends with each other. All these years later, still are. As long as we are together, we can still meet up and talk. At a family funeral, the last time was a few weeks ago.

 It might have been possible for friendship to hold us together, but it wasn't strong enough. There was a missing emotional connection. It wasn't the feeling of being an unbeatable unit. We were two people who thought it was the right thing to trapped each other.

data.body:
## There is a plan you need to put in place

 It could be a dream or a goal. You need a road map to get to that place. Work backwards, step-by-step, as you start with your vision for the future. Work it out with research, plan and preparation. Training up a level in your job is one of the steps you can take to move closer to independence.

## Keeping it together is what keeps it together

 There are some good reasons why you need to present a united front. You need to keep it together for as long as it takes if they are a family or financial arrangement. It is always better to do it in a way that is mutually beneficial.

 As we were lucky enough to do, some couples can keep it friendly. Others make it a battlefield. One partner dictates terms that make it difficult for the other to escape. Sometimes one partner will use emotional blackmail to keep the other from doing anything. The partners threaten to take the children away. Should their spouse leave them, there are others who will commit suicide.

 It is vital that you keep your hope alive. It can't stay that way forever. You will find an escape route sooner or later. You need to get help if you are depressed. Get help if you are being abused by your spouse. Get away from them with your children if they are physically violent. If you have to, go to the police.

## You have to fake it until you don't have to

It will feel like you are living a lie if you don't make sure it's a temporary state.

 The way ahead will reveal itself if you hold it together. It is a temporary thing. It's good to have good luck.

The content is accurate and true to the best of the author's knowledge, but is not meant to be a substitute for formal and individualized advice from a qualified professional.
